Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Oceancrest Avenue, north of the Adrilite Museum.
Room.LongDescription: The large Adrilite Museum of Natural History gives the citizens of Oceancrest a glimpse into the world outside of the City Walls, without actually having to leave the safety of the city. The museum houses many exotic species, rarely seen in Oceancrest, including a few very dangerous and deadly ones. On the north side of the street there is a shop almost hidden from view. A faded sign says World of Magical Wonders.
